entry.title: When you write code that is better than your previous code, It feels much better
entry.summary: So, I was working on this NLP project for sometime, today I am refactoring my code. The refactoring process is actally buring down all of my previous code and starting new. This time I did not do many mistakes that I did when I wrote it for the first time …
entry.content: So, I was working on this NLP project for sometime, today I am refactoring my code. The refactoring process is actally buring down all of my previous code and starting new. This time I did not do many mistakes that I did when I wrote it for the first time. It feels good.

entry.title: I am hoping to complete the nlp project today, no celebrations
entry.summary: Things are taking some motion, I think I'll be able to make it happen. I sent an email informing my inability to go for a trip with my friends, All I can hope is that they will not hate me for this, zero emotions is something that helps me, and …
entry.content: Things are taking some motion, I think I'll be able to make it happen. I sent an email informing my inability to go for a trip with my friends, All I can hope is that they will not hate me for this, zero emotions is something that helps me, and that's something I think is they way for me to be happy with myself, because in the end, it will be only me.

entry.title: Why being alone is the best thing you can do
entry.summary:
I have friends, but I enjoy being alone, I feel comfortable, I can be me.

I can't live in uncomfortable situations. A small defect or mishap in anything bothers my mind to a huge degree for some reason. So it's best for me to keep myself away from the randomness …
entry.content:
I have friends, but I enjoy being alone, I feel comfortable, I can be me.

I can't live in uncomfortable situations. A small defect or mishap in anything bothers my mind to a huge degree for some reason. So it's best for me to keep myself away from the randomness of the outer universe, and just try living in my own universe that is truly mine and no one can take it away from me, over which I have full control, i have to have that control. I need to live and be happy about living else rather be dead.

i am stressed
